title: Appointments Orgnizer between the Customers and the Servise provider
desc: Hi,The app would be used by 3 usres (Sys Admin "SA" + Service Provider "SP" + Customer "CU").To be develop for all platforms (IOS & Android), to support 4 different customers language (Eng., Arabic, Turkey & Ardo) "as bigining"where every SP can be one of:1- Managing his own schudle of appoitments.2- Shop Manager manage a lists of SP schudles of  Hi,The app would be used by 3 usres (Sys Admin "SA" + Service Provider "SP" + Customer "CU").To be develop for all platforms (IOS & Android), to support 4 different customers language (Eng., Arabic, Turkey & Ardo)every SP can be one of:1- Managing his own schudle of appoitments.2- Shop Manager manage a lists of SP schudles of appoitments.SA: to monitor the SP utlization,  issue invoice, logged recived payments, luck/unluck SP user, issue reports.SP: To download the app and add his shope name/photo and his name/photo and setup his working schudle and define his list of services (each service do have "Service name+duration+Fee), also he highlight that he is "on duty" at shop or out of duty.The SP schudle can be shown for today or tomorrwo or for next 7 days, so customer can pick the sutible time for him.CU: to download the app, where he can pick his favorite or latest SP lsit, or he can chose the "Type of SP" then all smiller SP's  will apper in a map, where he can pick one to check for avalabilty.I think I did provide a high-level points over the idea, more info will be shared when I have an agreemant for the compelete project (Analysys, Desing, Develpment, Testing, Adding to Store), documentations.Regards.Hatem

title: Android Voip Dialer With PTT Walkie Talkie Features(300-1500)
desc: You Must have An Android Voip Dialer already to Bid.Please don't Bid if you don't have  a  Working Android Voip Dailer with standard features, Anti Block tunneling and Byte Saver for me to test immediatelly. Your Android Voip Dailer App must be able to register to OpenSip ServerBasically we are buying your working Android Voip Dialer and asking you to add PTT Push To Talk features which is the same as Walkie Talkie  to it.The added PTT will share Db with the Dialer. If you need to see how PTT works please visit zello and test their PTT app. Also we can provide you a sample open source ptt code.PTT employs half duplex instead of full duplex. Lets say full voip uses 2 channels for conversation , but PTT use just one. When one party speaks the other must wait.Only Bib If you understand and have the requirements I need.

title: automated bot/APK to win Drag Racing Game (Using Bluestacks Emulator)
desc: There is a Drag Racing game that I play via Bluestacks emulator.I have created a script in AutoHotKey that automatically races, It uses Sleep timers to know when to Launch the car and when to shift gears. It works ok however the times fluctuate slightly which causes problems. I would like someone to create a new script (don't care if it works the same way or if you have a better way of doing it) that will automate the Drag Racing Gameplay. Timings need to be very accurate to within 0.001 Milliseconds.The script will:-Read and/or Integrate into Bluestacks-Automatically Launch the car as soon as the race starts with a impeccable and consistent reaction time.-Change gears when the speedometer needle hits specific RPMS.-Have a easy to use GUI to allow me to set Launch and Shift positions based on the RPM.
